headline: Providing a Personalized & Diversified Retail Experience for Everyone

blocks.headline: Providing a Personalized & Diversified Retail Experience for Everyone

right.headline: Try it on, anytime, anywhere
right.subText: We help apparel retailers by providing a virtual try-on solution for their customers to visualize their look and fit conveniently.

blocks.headline: How it works
blocks.subtext: Through our proprietary Machine Learning and Computer Vision technology, customers are able see how products look on their bodies instantly by uploading a full-body image.

right.headline: Personalized shopping for everyone
right.subText: Look & fit are inherent problems for both customers and retailers. By providing a try-on solution that is tailored for consumers of all shapes, colors, and sizes, Proneer Virtual Try-On improves customer experience for retailers to gain more conversion.

right.headline: Proneer Solutions
right.subText: Our technology helps both online & offline retailers with retail solutions  that include:

features.heading: Gather metadata for product development & marketing

right.headline: Who We Are
right.subText: Proneer is a leading provider of cutting-edge technologies and services in retail space, offering scalable solutions for businesses of all sizes. Founded by a group of engineers and designers with experience in various corporate environments, we offer smart, innovative services to dozens of clients worldwide.Why not join our fast growing client base? Get in touch today for a demo to learn more.
